text: For over 100 years, Nat Geo has been documenting life in the Big Apple for readers around the globe. Take a journey through our July 1918 issue, ‚ÄúThe Metropolis of Mankind,‚Äù and see how much New York City has changed through the lens of our photographers. üîó‚Ä¶
